transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Sahil ji gal kar rahe ne?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan sir actually main India Mart to gal kar reha tuhadi gal hui si Abhishek naal.
Customer: Haan ji mere ko number si ehda ji.
Executive: Haan tuhada kuch update aaya si ehda regarding service.
Customer: Pichle wala hi si ga Teer ji, oh tusi clear nahi karaya aje tak.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji te sir actually tusi jehda service chal rahi hai na oh tuhano use karni chahidi hai mere hisab naal.
Customer: Main phir ohi gal aa gayi ohna nu bhi ohi gal samjhaai, tuhano bhi ohi gal samjhaunga so mainu nahi lagda ki eh matlab mere time nu bhi waste kar reha plus tuhade time nu bhi.
Executive: Theek hai ji, main ek gal hor kinni vaari tuhano dassa mainu eh gal dasso ji, is gal da jawab do.
Hanji ji ek gal main tuhade mehnta naal tuhade product add karaye si asi hai na te ohde vich bhi kam gaya sir.
Customer: Main te oh keh nahi reha tuhade ohde jinne bhi charges hai ge ohde rakho tusi, main pichle last tin mahineya to tuhano eh cheez ehi keh reha bar bar keh reha haan mainu nahi lagda ki eh gal samjhan vich koi eddi jyada science di lod hai gi aa ya kuch bhi edda karna payega.
Executive: Dekho main bahut hi matlab respect de naal main tuhano eh keh reha haan ki meri gal nu samjho.
Customer: Mere to ek gal bar bar na bulao.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
Customer: Mainu us cheez da koi hal nahi mil pa reha pichle tin mahineya to, oh bhi time mera tusi edda hi langha ta ke eh kar rahe hai ge yeh woh agge kar daange gal.
Executive: So main samajh chukya haan tuhadi ki matlab ki algorithm use kar rahe ho jo bhi, theek hai so main us cheez de vich hor nahi apna time barbaad karna chahna.
Customer: Theek hai ohnu Abhishek nu bhi main ehi kahega tuhano bhi ehi keh reha ki dekho je te pyar naal kam ho janda te bahut vadiya gal hai gi ohde koi reach nahi hai gi.
Executive: Theek hai ji but mainu duje agar tarike li majboor karna chah rahe ho so that is your call.
Customer: Mere ko ehi do option bache ek te legal option ho gaya ya phir social media ho gaya ji, so oh dona di hun main hor wait nahi kar sakda kyunki tin mahine main ohda apne gaal le aa.
Executive: Te main uthe bhi ehi cheez hi mention karan ja reha plus sareya nu bhi main ehi recommend karunga ki is cheez de utte India Mart te bharosa na kitta jaave.
Customer: Sir enj bhi ho sakda hai ki tusi work kar lo buyleads te because call bhi aa rahi hai batheriya calla aa rahi hai ne tuhano incoming.
Customer: Main kar hi nahi reha so main ki karunga oh pata da.
Executive: Thoda bahut bhi kam dikha sakte ho.
Customer: Completely hi band kar ditta gaya te main phir ki fayda hai ga ohna da utto, pehle te useless ho giya na matlab sa, ohde je main apna time waste karna hoyega ya phir agar main udda hi vela baitha phir te main kari jaava, oh mere kise kam di nahi hai giya, theek hai ji so tusi ehnu jo bhi samjhna hai ga samjh lo but I am going to do this right now.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Tusi want main explain kar dunga sari jagah te jithe jithe main share kar reha.
Executive: But enj hunda hai na tuhadi service ek saal di hai gi si try kar ke.
Customer: Main dekho tuhade ko meri gal da jawab nahi hai ga tusi mainu ki keh rahe ho te main tuhano agge ki keh reha haan.
Executive: Sahab tuhadi gal mainu main samjh bhi aa sun bhi rahi haan enj nahi hai, but agar tusa payment kitta si na 83 li.
Customer: Ki kitta si ga?
Executive: Tusa payment ditti si na 83 di, ek saal di.
Customer: Haan ji dasso.
Executive: Haan te ohi ohi oh main keh rahi haan ki possible te nahi hai na ta hi kar ke tuhano enj sare loki mana kar rahe ne.
Customer: Main but mainu jo gal kahi gi main phir main dekho ohi gal aa gayi main pagal thodi aa baitha yaar ki main bar bar ek hi cheez jehdi cheez mainu kade kahi na jaai jaave main phir us cheez te adeya rava, so that does not make sense.
Executive: So so okay mainu koi problem nahi hai gi tusi mainu phir to call karni aa you are welcome to call me but main hun nahi entertain karna tuhano na main hor wait karna chahna sidhi ji gal hai gi mere tin mahine agge kharab ho chuke aa.
Customer: So jo bhi refund di gal hai gi aa three months before to start hoi payi aa te main odon to hi apna mangunga ji, theek hai nale us to pehla main koi khas services use nahi kitiya na mere kam aaiya hai giya va, so main us hi bihaf te main ja reha ji hun social media te te dusri cheez apna legal action te.
Executive: Theek hai mam.
Customer: Agar tuhano yakin hai ga tuhadi ID nu vich tag kar dunga mainu apni ID de do tusi very simple, Ganesh Aggarwal ji nu te main karunga hi tag obviously.
Executive: Theek hai mam.
Customer: Hun katt reha hun main.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for unused services.

- Frustrated with lack of resolution.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with IndiaMART's services.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- No resolution provided during the call.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Annoyed | Risk of churn



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, legal action, social media, buyleads
